name: Orbz
description:
Mouse to play. Click and drag downwards to aim.

Light up other orbs and blocks by hitting then with a light orb. Light orbs will deal damage equal to the number on the light orb. Lit objects cannot be damaged further as long as they are lit.

Destroy the orbs and blocks by reducing their number to zero.  You get +1 health (represented as the bar below the screen) for each orb and block you reduce to zero. 

These orbs and blocks will advance down the screen and if they hit the bar below the screen, you lose health. If your health goes to zero, its game over!

Windows version is quite untested, so please check out the WebGL version in the meantime (doesn't have ability to pause somehow and dream.lo is not working)
